name: Midnight Maintenance
description:
Something weird is going on in the TOTALLY STABLE town. The power is out. There’s pools of mysterious green liquid. There’s rumors of exploding zombies. Someone should investigate... Like you.

Made solo in 48 hours for the Ludum Dare 49 Compo.

Hopefully cross platform downloads will be up in the next couple days. I want to do WebGL as well but it performs poorly and crashes at random -- so that might take some time to sort out.
